column5: 2 names actually, Port Arthur(North side) and Fort William(South side).
Fort William/Port Arthur?  Dayum - too late  JF
Port Arther is correct. Just heard this on a trivia game and thought Tom or Dan would of got it.  Tell them what they won Johnny.LOL
Johnny better not say a free day trip on Lloyd's boat. I am sick as a dog right now, and have no holidays lined up,   :wallbash:

I'm a Fort William native and Tom resides in the former Port Arthur.  You must be bored tonight Brian waiting for the big fight and for the jet dryers to get off of the track. Enjoy your evening Buddy...
Thanks Dan.Yes Im waiting for JR to take this race and waiting for the big fight.Im off now.Have a great night aswell bud.
